extraDescription: Employment Insurance Automation Systems Improvement II (EIASI II) a?c Co-conduct (with IITB) a technical assessment of COTS solutions (including MS Dynamics and add-on survey tools)  a?c Develop current Quality questionnaire work flows for EI, OAS and CPP PAAR and PRAR programs a?c Lead the drafting of the Gate 2 documentation as required
comments: For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
